244241.「あわわっ！ びっくりしたぁ！\n アンタ 誰よ？: Aaah! You scared me! Who are you?

244242.「へぇー <pc>っていうの。\n アンタも デスマスターの志望者なんだぁ。:
<pc>, huh? So you're an aspiring
death master, too.

244243.「って そりゃ そっかー。\n 墓石に囲まれた こーんな しんきくさいトコ\n:
Of course you are. There's no way you'd come
to a creepy place surrounded by gravestones
unless you were called here.

244244.「あらあらぁ 正直な子は 好きよ～。\n でも デスマスターを目指すからには\n:
My, I just love honest kids～! But you'll
have to get used to an atmosphere like this if
you want to be a death master.

244245.「アタシは ネリム。アンタと同じく\n デスマスターを こころざす者だよ。\n:
I'm Nelim. I've got my sights on becoming a
death master, like you. Nice to meet ya,
<pc>♪

244246.「わたくしは デスマスターの デズリン。\n あなたに 手紙をさしあげた者よ。\:
I am Death Master Deathlin. I am the one who
contacted you. Thank you for answering my
summons.

244247.「わたくしの 弟子になると決心したなら\n 一人前のデスマスターに してさしあげ:
If you wish to become my apprentice, then I
will make you into a first-rate death master.

244248.「デズリン師匠に 手紙で呼ばれて\n のこのこ やって来たものの\n ひとりで:
I came here by myself after getting a letter
from Master Deathlin, but I was worried about
being all alone.

244249.「そうそう デズ師匠ってば 自分で書いた\n 参考書まで 用意してくれてるんだよ:
Oh yeah, Master Dezzie even wrote her own
reference guide for us.

244250.「うふふ。面と向かって言われると 照れるわ～。\n 今後 み～っちり デスマスタ:
Mhmhm, it's a bit embarrassing to hear you say that to my face～. From now on, I will be teaching you the ins and outs of being a
death master, so you better prepare yourself.

244251.「さて <pc>さん。まずは こちらに来て\n わたくしの話を 聞いてくださいな:
Now then, <pc>. First off, come
over here and listen to what I have to say.

246591.「しっかし こんな本まで出してる\n デスマスターだなんて……尊敬しちゃうなぁ。:
But for a death master to put out her own
book... I have a lot of respect for her.
